changelog:
## Changes
 - Changed some cache stuff, hopefully SMEditor works while offline again
 - Added the ability to override parity with left/right heel/toe
   - The dancing bot will still prefer to hit brackets while facing foward, so you will have to mark backwards brackets manually
 - Enable parity highlights by default
 - Allow opening more than one instance of SMEditor when using the app (File > New Window)
 - Added more default timing events when creating a new chart
 - Added a search bar to the menubar (under Help tab)
 - Added commit info in the About window
 - Tech error indicators hide when in play mode
 - Centered the no files text in the custom file picker
## Fixes
 - Fixed BANNER not being saved correctly when saving as .sm
 - Fixed an issue with measures when no time signature is placed at beat 0 and a non 4/4 signature is used
 - Fixed not being able to remove some notes when force every snap is on
 - Fixed pastel noteskin not showing 192nd quants

## Changes
- You can now change the color of the feet for parity checking in user preferences.
- Changed how the menubar behaves (you have to click on the tabs to open them, but you don't have to be precise while navigating dropdowns anymore)
- The parity checker now checks for an ambiguous first step.
 ## Fixes
 - The canvas no longer reacts to mouse events when a window is over it
- Fixed a bug in how twisted brackets are calculated 
 - Fixed the chart info scroll highlights being very black

## Parity Checking!
- You can know enable parity checking (default keybind `E` or through *View > Parity > Enable Parity Checking*)!
- Includes features such as:
  - Automatic flow error checking (unmarked doublestep, ambiguous step, etc...)
  - Player direction timeline
  - Candle highlighting
  - Dancing bot
  - ...and more! (check out the [wiki](/smeditor/guide/parity) for more details)
- Calculation happens in the background for little to no lag (hopefully)
- Any parity data is saved to a file called `data.sme`. This file can be safely deleted for release.
- Currently only dance-single and dance-double are supported.
- This is still in a beta state, so please report bugs!
 
## Changes
- SMEditor will now ask to load the SSC file if it is available in the same folder. You can change this behavior in *Preferences > General > Auto-load SSC files*
- You can now have the timelines on the right of the screen follow the current song position (*Preferences > Timelines > Follow current position*)
- WARPS and FAKES can now only have values to the nearest 192nd to match in game behavior (entering a different value will round it internally).
- Reorganized a few options in the preferences window.
- Changes a few elements to have different mouse cursors on hover
- Reversed Yes/No order on no audio file confirmation window to match other windows

## Fixes
- Fixed another memory leak :(
- Fix speeds with equal values and different delays being removed
- The current note selection correctly appears on the timeline
- Fixed waveform not updating when loading a new audio file through the chart/song properties
- Fixed color inputs not working in the preferences window

## Changes
- **Made UI scale with window height + font size** (this should hopefully help larger/smaller displays)
  - If the UI is still too large/small, you can adjust the size in the Preferences window (UI scale).
  - please report any bugs! this is a pretty big change
- Exporting videos!
  - You can now export a video of your chart under File > Export video...
  - This feature does not work on Firefox, unfortunately
- Added Force Snap Notes option
  - This will force any notes placed to be on a snap even if the cursor is not currently on a snap.
- Reduced mine volume
## Fixes
- Fixed the path being incorrect when selecting a file in the song/chart properties window when using the desktop app on Windows
- Made hold flashes display in edit mode
- Fixes some issues with embedding SMEditor + embed flags
- Fixed Max NPS displaying as -1.7e308 (for real this time)

## Fixes
- **Fixed key detection for non-QWERTY keyboards**
- Fixed selection box not updating when chart is scrolled/moved using arrow keys
- Fixed up/down and next/previous measure not inverting when "Invert scroll while in reverse" is on
- Fixed chart beat not updating when time is updated and the song is not playing 

## Internal Changes
- Revamped how chart stats are calculated (slight performance increase!)
- Renamed some timing data functions (docs updated soon i promise)
- Updated some packages

## Changes
 - **Pump fixes**
   - **Reworked hold logic in pump game modes**
   - Added pump timing windows
 - **New Keybinds**
   - Ctrl-Up/Down: Previous/next stream
     - This replaces the previous keybind of changing scroll speed (rebound to Shift-Up/Down)
   - Shift-F5/F6: Previous/next song in pack
 - Increase timing event value precision to 6 decimals (you can enter more than 3 decimals now)
 - Make timing events snap to a minimum of 192nds to match game behavior
    - Previously you could place them at 1000ths, but this will not load in game correctly
 - Changing timing windows now save for all similar modes (dance, pump)
 - Sync Window offset/bpm results can be clicked to apply at the current beat
 - Add options to convert a selection to a timing event ("Selection -> Timing")
 - Added an about window to check your current version ("Help -> About")
## Fixes 
 - Fix receptor dragging while in reverse
 - Fix switching ease unit for SPEEDS in Edit Timing Data window not working
 - Fixed "PageUp"/"PageDown" displaying as "Home"/"End" on non-Mac systems in keybinds

## Fixes
- Fixed files not saving on Safari (thanks safari)
- Fixed timing data parsing when events appear out of order in the sm file
- Fixed Song Properties file pickers not working correctly on desktop app

## Changes
 - **Reworked split timing (chart/song timing)**
   - Timing columns have a C/S box when in **Edit Timing** mode. You can toggle between them by opening the popup or clicking the **Manage Split Timing** button in the status widget
   - Wiki will be updated soon to reflect these changes
 - **Autosaving!**
   - Every once in a while, your file will be saved (default 120 seconds, changable in options)
   - Stored in SSC format under `.smebak`
 - **SPEEDS and SCROLLS are now allowed in SM files** for recent NotITG changes (hopefully there isn't an SM parser that breaks because of this)
 - Added an option to open these changelogs under Help in the menubar
 - Added keybinds to toggle Edit/Add Timing (`T` and `Alt-T` by default)
 - Changed Skip to Start button in status widget to skip to start of song, not beat 0 to match keybind
 - Changed the file picker so that Chrome doesn't complain about "containing system files"
 - Changed EQ and Detect Sync canvases to match theme colors
 - Made textboxes in chart properties undoable
 - Allow keybinds to use numbers (this will take precedence over placing notes, but you can bind gameplay keybinds)
## Fixes 
 - **File saving issues**
   - Fixed files not being saved properly when special characters are used
   - Fixed chart timing data not being saved
   - Fixed chart timing data being parsed incorrectly (but somehow still being saved)
 - **Multiple assist tick / metronome fixes**
   - Fixed them being loud when a hold is being placed during playback
   - Fixed metronome spam on WARPS
 - Fixed holds not being truncated sometimes due to triplets
 - Fixed "Invert scroll in reverse" when "Snap every scroll" is on
 - Fixed many UI elements not being visible when in light themes
 - Fix song playback starting at the wrong time with songs with positive offset + rate mod

## Changes
- Changelog System
    - *we'll just start the versions from 1.0.0*
 - Update Popups
    - You will be notified when a new version is available (just refresh the page) 
 ## Fixes 
 - Fixed two memory leaks when loading a new chart
